data.title: Gerald R. Ford Presidential Library and Museum
data.text:
The Gerald R. Ford Presidential Digital Library

White House State Dinners, 1974-76

Menus, Programs, Photos, and Selected Other Documents

The Library has extensive holdings on visits to the United States by foreign heads of state during the presidency of Gerald R. Ford. These visits usually involved both discussions with the President and a state dinner. Mrs. Ford's Social Secretary Maria Downs has written for the Library a description of the process of planning and putting on a state dinner.

August 16, 1974 - King Hussein of Jordan

September 12, 1974 - Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin of Israel

September 25, 1974 - President Giovanni Leone of Italy

October 8, 1974 - First Secretary Edward Gierek of Poland

November 12, 1974 - Chancellor Bruno Kreisky of Austria

December 4, 1974 - Prime Minister Pierre Trudeau of Canada

December 5, 1974 - Chancellor Helmut Schmidt of Germany

January 30, 1975 - Prime Minister Harold Wilson of Great Britain

February 5, 1975 - Prime Minister Zulfikar Ali Bhutto of Pakistan

April 19, 1975 - President Kenneth Kaunda of Zambia

April 29, 1975 - King Hussein of Jordan

May 1, 1975 - Prime Minister Hedi Nouira of Tunisia

May 8, 1975 - Prime Minister Lee Kuan Yew of Singapore

May 14, 1975 - Prime Minister Johannes den Uyl of the Netherlands

May 15, 1975 - Shah of Iran

June 11, 1975 - Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin of Israel

June 16, 1975 - President Walter Scheel of Germany

August 5, 1975 - Prime Minister Takeo Miki of Japan

September 25, 1975 - President Alfonso Lopez Michelsen of Colombia

October 2, 1975 - Emperor and Empress of Japan

October 27, 1975 - President Anwar Sadat of Egypt

November 12, 1975 - Prime Minister Gaston Thorn of Luxembourg

January 27, 1976 - Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin of Israel

March 17, 1976 - Prime Minister Liam Cosgrave of Ireland

March 30, 1976 - King Hussein of Jordan

May 17, 1976 - President Valery Giscard d'Estaing of France

June 2, 1976 - King Juan Carlos and Queen Sophia of Spain

July 7, 1976 - Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh of Great Britain

July 15, 1976 - Chancellor Helmut Schmidt of Germany

July 27, 1976 - Prime Minister Malcolm Fraser of Australia

August 3, 1976 - President Urho Kekkonen of Finland

September 21, 1976 - President William Tolbert of Liberia

December 6, 1976 - Prime Minister Giulio Andreotti of Italy

Other Resources

March 13, 1974 - Vice President and King Hussein of Jordan (entire folder digitized - includes material on a state dinner hosted by Vice President and Mrs. Ford)

Main Archival Sources:

Russell Armentrout Files, 1974-77 (First Lady's Staff: Social Entertainments Office)

Maria Downs Files, 1974-77 and Papers, 1975-77 (First Ladys Staff: Social Secretary)

National Security Adviser. Memoranda of Conversations, 1973-77

White House Photographic Office Photographs, 1974-77

Document selection and much of the scanning for this project was completed by Library intern Melissa Hernandez, a student at the University of Michigan School of Information.
